alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 11:36AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds and Blowing Snow Today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Winds gusting 40 to 50 mph. Locally higher gusts are possible along the south side of Casper and across the higher elevations and exposed ridge lines of the Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County. * WHEN...Through Tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds can pose an elevated risk of blow over for light and high profile vehicles. Blowing and drifting snow across roads and other open or exposed areas is possible. A few banded snow showers could also accompany the gusty winds. Very low visibility can occur with these snow showers in combination with the wind and blowing snow.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
